name: Spinball (itch) (Bardon)
description:
Here You control the Amiga-Ball and must collect Diamonds, 10 in each level. But avoid the enemies, there are dancing on the terrain and are hunting you.

The red fields make you slower, the green fields make you faster and when you collide with the black field you die.

You control the ball with w,a,s,d and with mouse you look around.
